name: Ed Sheeran — Loop Tour
description:
The British singer-songwriter is playing Sky Stadium on 21 January 2026 as part of his Australia and New Zealand stadium shows on the Loop Tour.
Ed's forthcoming eighth studio album ‘Play’ is set to be released on 12 September.
The album marks the beginning of a fresh new chapter of music for the artist.
Described as an “explorative, technicolour pop album”, ‘Play’ will be full of fun, chaos and heart — and the show is set to match in both energy and production.
With plenty of other hits and crowd favourites from his back catalogue, the brand-new live show is set to be an epic event for every kind of Ed Sheeran fan.

id: Explorers — The Age of Discovery with James May-The Opera House, Wellington, New Zealand-Wellington NZ
name: Explorers — The Age of Discovery with James May
venue: The Opera House, Wellington, New Zealand
description:
Learn about famous and not-so-famous explorers from Ice Age migrations through to space travel.
In ‘Explorers — The Age of Discovery with James May’, the lives of great voyagers come to life on stage.
James May will unravel breathtaking tales.
He covers people like Leif Erikson, John Cabot, James Cook’s navigator Tupaia, Stanley and Livingstone, and Gertrude Bell.
He’s also known for his charisma live on stage and on screen.
